Description:
RequirementsBachelor's degree in accounting, finance, or related field
Minimum of 10 years of experience in accounting, with at least 5 years in a leadership role
CPA or other relevant professional certification
Strong knowledge of GAAP and other compliance regulations
Experience in real estate accounting preferred
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to effectively communicate with all levels of the organization
Ability to work independently and manage competing priorities.Job Details
